review: Monte & Sons Auto Repair exceeded my expectations in every way. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. They took the time to explain every detail of the repairs needed and even offered to drive me home while they worked on my car. The quality of their work is top-notch, and their honesty and affordability make them a rare gem in the auto repair industry. I couldn’t be happier with my experience and will definitely be returning for all my future car needs.
